problem.p:
Which of the following statement(s) will give a result of 9?
(i) array[0][3] + array[1][0]
(ii) array[1][1] + array[2][4]
(iii) array[1][3] + array[0][1]
(iv) array[0][2] + array[1][1]

div.p: The correct answer is the second option. The fourth option is incorrectly marked as a correct option. We decided to give marks for both options for the question. No grading will be affected.
